{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12131v1", "title": "Equidistribution of CM points on Shimura Curves and ternary theta series", "summary": "We prove an equidistribution statement for the reduction of Galois orbits of
CM points on the special fiber of a Shimura curve over a totally real field,
considering both the split and the ramified case. The main novelty of the
ramified case consists in the use of the moduli interpretation of the
Cerednik--Drinfeld uniformisation. Our result is achieved by associating to the
reduction of CM points certain Hilbert modular forms of weight $3/2$ and by
analyzing their Fourier coefficients. Moreover, we also deduce the Shimura
curves case of the integral version of the Andr\'e--Oort conjecture.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-16T14:45:22Z"}
